title-group.article-title: CONSTRUCTING ELLIPTIC CURVES OVER FINITE FIELDS WITH PRESCRIBED TORSION

abstract.p: We present a method for constructing optimized equations for the modular curve X 1 (N) using a local search algorithm on a suitably defined graph of birationally equivalent plane curves. We then apply these equations over a finite field ùîΩ q to efficiently generate elliptic curves with nontrivial N-torsion by searching for affine points on X 1 (N)(ùîΩ q ), and we give a fast method for generating curves with (or without) a point of order 4N using X 1 (2N).
